paragraphs: We shifted camp to the island just west of Vassamsi Grotto. Meet us there once you collect our fee. Rumor has it that this mine's worst than all the rest, so let's not linger here long, eh?
If you see those two half-wits in Sadrith Mora, give them a kick in the arse. We're running a smuggling outfit, not a gang of lazy drunks.
